synopsis: Speed Racer, the son of world renown race car designer Pops Racer, attempts to help Pops with his plans to improve the fabulous and powerful Mach 5 racing car.
Can the untested Speed Racer win the race from the evil clutches of Ace Ducey and his gang of thugs and save his father's plans to improve the Mach 5? Watch the conclusion of "The Great Plan."

title.jp: Challenge of the Masked Racer, Part 1

synopsis: There's excitement in the air over the big Trans Country Race. But when word gets around that the mysterious, unbeatable Masked Racer is competing, everyone knows there will be trouble.

title.jp: Challenge of the Masked Racer, Part 2

synopsis: There's excitement in the air over the big Trans Country Race. But when word gets around that the mysterious, unbeatable Masked Racer is competing, everyone knows there will be trouble in the conclusion of "Challenge of the Masked Racer."
Speed Racer comes to the aid of a mysterious old man whose Model T car has broken down, but little does he know that it could lead $1 billion worth of GOLD!
There are many surprises on the road to the hidden treasure and in the conclusion of "The Secret Engine."

title.jp: The Race Against the Mammoth Car, Part 1

synopsis: It's a rare race called the No Limit World Race. Any type of car in the world may enter. Inspector Detector is on the trail of thieves who have stolen $50 million in gold bars.

title.jp: The Race Against the Mammoth Car, Part 2

synopsis: Join Speed Racer as he battles Cruncher Block, his henchmen and tries to out run the Mammoth Car in the fabulous Mach 5, in one of the most stunning chase sequences ever.
Speed Racer goes head to head with one of his fiercest competitors, Snake Oiler, star of the world famous Car Acrobatic Team, in the treacherous Big Alpine Race.
The evil leader of the Car Acrobatic Team, Captain Terror, will stop at nothing to win the race.
Speed teams up with the mysterious Racer X and a newly designed Mach 5 in their efforts against the trickiest team of daredevil drivers ever assembled in the most dangerous race in the world!

It's been 15 years since the Danger Pass Race in which the driver of the super powerful X3 Melange racing car was deliberately forced into a fatal crash by the Three Roses Club.  In the anniversary race, the X3 Melange mysteriously appears for revenge.

On the 15 year anniversary Danger Pass race, the tragic Melange car mysteriously appears in the race seeking revenge on anyone who was involved in that ill-fated race - including the innocent Speed Racer. And the Three Roses team is out to get Speed too!
Speed Racer and the Go Team have flown the Mach 5 to Sandoland to compete in a grueling 800 mile desert race, where they are accused of sabotage.

Speed Racer and the Go Team have flown the Mach 5 to Sandoland to compete in a grueling 800 mile desert race.  The gang is accused of sabotage and stumble into a web of conspiracy, treachery and deception in the desert.
Speed is invited to compete in the risky and unusual Fire Festival Racer through the mountainous terrain of the country Kapecapek.

Speed competes in the Fire Festival Racer through the mountainous terrain of the country Kapecapek where he meets Kabala, a Kapecapek native regarded as one oft he best and most dangerous racers in the world.
Speed Racer and the gang are on the way to compete in the Nitona Handicap when they meet Twinkle Banks, the auto acrobat star of the nearly bankrupt Universal Circus.

Speed Racer and the gang meet auto acrobat star, Twinkle Banks, of the nearly bankrupt Universal Circus competing at the Nitona Handicap.  A suspicious promoter convinces Twinkle to drive her car across Niagara Fallsas great publicity for the circus.

title.jp: The Fastest Car on Earth, Part 1

synopsis: A mysterious car contains the most powerful and dangerous racing car engine in the world, perhaps too powerful. Curiosity gets the best of our hero Speed Racer when he discovers the engine is the famous GRX and takes the car for a test drive.

title.jp: The Fastest Car on Earth, Part 2

synopsis: In a daring and thrilling finale, Speed must use all his will power and determination and racing skills (and a little help from Pops) to win the race against the fastest car on earth.

title.jp: The Mach 5 Vs. The Mach 5: Part 1

synopsis: Speed is arrested for robbery after secret plans for the mighty Mizmo Ray, an invention by Professor Power, are stolen from the National Science Institute by someone driving the Mach 5!!

title.jp: The Mach 5 Vs. The Mach 5: Part 2

synopsis: All evidence points to Speed robbing the National Science Institute driving the Mach 5.  Speed must prove his innocence and defeat the fake Mach 5 to clear his name. It’s a fight to the finish - but who will win?

Pops Racer builds a fabulous mini racer for the young Prince Jam, the ruler of the country of Saccarin, to race in the Baby Grand Prix. Spridle, who desperately wants to see the race, stows away with his pal Chim Chim on the plane to Saccarin.

Speed Racer uncovers mischievous stowaways to the country of Saccarin, Spridle and Chim Chim, but while chasing the two, Spridle is mistaken for the little Prince and is kidnapped by three mysterious men.

Speed and Trixie befriend Janine, a young girl whose ambition is to be a race car driver. But her father, Mr. Trotter, hates cars and will do anything to keep his daughter away from them - including sabotage.

The story begins on a hot dusty day with Speed Racer ready to compete in the first stage of the Sahara Racer. Speed and Trixie get involved in a search for a girl named Calicia, the daughter of the world famous archeologist, Dr. Digger O.
Speed and Trixie find themselves in peril as they get involved in the search for an archeologist's daughter and the Queen of the Nile's lost treasure.
Racing teams from car factories all over the world are participating in a super car race on the brand new yet dangerous race course, the Snake Track.

On a stormy night, Speed Racer and Spridle's blind friend, Delicia, is visited by an escaped convict doesn't harm her.   Knowing she was alone during the storm, they check on Delicia and get abducted at gunpoint by the convict in the Mach 5.

Speed is racing in the Fujiyama Grand Prix at the same time diplomats from all over the world have gathered to attend the Piecemeal Conference. While sightseeing, Speed and Trixie stumble upon a gang of assassins planning to take over the world.

After winning the Fujiyama Grand Prix, Speed and Trixie go sightseeing and stumble upon a gang of assassins who are planning to take over the world. Their scheme is to kill off all the conference attendees, leaving the countries defenseless.

As Speed celebrates his victory at the South American Grand Prix, the mayor of the small village of Tonado lays dying from a poisonous snake bite. All attempts to save him are sabotaged by a ruthless villager who wants to be the mayor.

Speed Racer has been hired by the Baboom Motor Company to test drive the Supersonic Rocket Car, a new rocket-powered car designed by Pops Racer. Expected to break all known speed records, the car blows up soon after tests begin.

Days before the Trans Africa Grand Prix, Speed Racer meets a professor investigating the local legend of huge monsters that inhabit a mysterious island.  Little does Speed know that he too will soon come face to face with unexpected creatures.
Speed uncovers a diabolical scheme involving human and animal mutations, warring political factions and the evil General Smasher - all of which Speed has to deal with before he competes in the race.

Speed Racer and Trixie are competing in a qualifying rally for the Monte Carlo Grand Prix. They are interrupted by an psychotic international criminal, Mr. Flasbucks, also a notorious gambler, who has just robbed a bank.

The exotic city of Ambrocia hosts the world famous Mystic Grand Prix. A gang of terrorists plan a take over the country, deposing the ruling monarchy, Prince Snowier and Princess Gracious.  The mysterious RacerX foils the assassination plot.

The mysterious RacerX foils the assassination plot in Ambrocia when the race is moved to the country of Abalonia.  The assassins follow, intent on killing their next target, President Montebank of Abalonia.
Speed Racer and Trixie are on their way to the North American Grand Prix when the plane they are flying in is hijacked bu a band of masked men.

It’s one of those rare times when Speed Racer is at a race as a spectator and not as a participant. All of sudden the race cars start up by themselves and smash through the guardrails, speeding off without their drivers!
Speed Racer is all revved up for the distinguished Southern Hemisphere Pineapple Grand Prix in which the drivers must carry a pineapple in their car as they cross the finish line.
On the way to the Hong Kong International Grand Prix, Speed Racer is witness to a horrible crime and is thrust into a world of international espionage and intrigue.

Speed Racer has just won the Great Eastern Central Grand Prix when he is fired on by unknown assailants. Later, after arriving in Hawaii for his next race, he is still being pursued by a gang of criminals wanted by the International Secret Service.
Speed enters a dangerous car wrestling match in which heavily armed cars try to smash each other to bits.
Speed is asked to help the Office of Space Development to get a shipment of Uraniumtane through to the International Space Development Base which is being built somewhere in “the American West”.
From somewhere in the hills of Scotland, a mad scientist, Dr. McFife, unleashes a monster car with a brain and no one is safe.

In honor of his missing daughter, Baron Von Vondervon puts up a huge amount of money for the Junk Car Grand Prix, a race in which the competing cars must be constructed from piles of junk and only female drivers may enter.
Speed needs to compete in one more Grand Prix in order to qualify for the world championship. En route to the qualifying race, his plane crashes on a remote island and the Mach 5 is damaged.

It’s been one year since Speed Racer beat the car acrobatic team, and now they want revenge! Meanwhile, the syndicate, International Spies, led by Mr. Supremo, plans to get rid of Speed’s protector, Racer X.
Speed Racer and his best friend Sparky are competing in the most fantastic race ever held, the grueling 25,000 mile race around the world Grand Prix.

The richest man in the world has offered a mountain of gold and the hand of his lovely daughter as first prize.  Join Speed in the grandest of grand finales in the final episode of the Classic Speed Racer television series.
